current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To limit the authority of the Secretary of the Interior
		  to issue regulations before December 31, 2017, under the Surface Mining Control
		  and Reclamation Act of 1977.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Energy and Natural
			 Resources

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill;
			 which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Coal Miner Employment and Domestic
			 Energy Infrastructure Protection Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not, before December 31, 2017, issue or approve any proposed
			 or final regulation under the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of
			 1977
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977

header.#text:
Limitation on
			 authority to issue regulations under the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation
			 Act of 1977

text.#text:
adversely impact
			 employment in coal mines in the United States;

cause a reduction
			 in revenue received by the Federal Government or any State, tribal, or local
			 government, by reducing through regulation the quantity of coal in the United
			 States that is available for mining;

reduce the
			 quantity of coal available for domestic consumption or for export;

designate any
			 area as unsuitable for surface coal mining and reclamation operations;

expose the United
			 States to liability for taking the value of privately owned coal through
			 regulation; or

cause further
			 time delays to permitting or increase costs.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S831 IS: Coal Miner Employment and Domestic Energy Infrastructure Protection Act of 2013
